data.name: Command.Encode.Label
data.value: Encode text using the Caesar Cipher, either using a number provided or a random number.

data.name: Version.Description
data.value: The version of caesar being used.

data.name: Input.Description
data.value: The text file to get words to be encoded or decoded.

data.name: Output.Description
data.value: The text file to save the encoded or decoded value as.

data.name: Shift.Description
data.value: The number to shift each character by.

data.name: Exception.Argument.NoWords
data.value: Failed to provide the words to be encoded.

data.name: Command.Decode.Label
data.value: Decode text using the Caesar Cipher, either using a number provided or a random number.

data.name: Command.License
data.value: Prints the License Notice to the terminal.
